room_title: Escape room "On the Radio" by Think It Out Escape Rooms and Mental Gymnastics in Detroit
room_description: It's 2 AM and you and your band mates break into WPZL Radio.  Your goal is to get your song played on the Emergency Broadcast System for the whole world to hear.  You've only got an hour before the DJ comes in, but be careful - getting in is the easy part, getting out starts the challenge.
